segments.text: Do you think my briefcase is big enough to put in all these stuff ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Laptop , flash disk , a ballpoint pen , a pencil , a notebook , a pair of glasses , cell phone , charger , moisture , notion , ... Oh , that is too much . You are not going to a business trip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I need all of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , the company will provide you with all of these supplies . So , you can leave this very thick notebook at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . But it is my lucky charm . I carry it all the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Suit yourself . Don â€™ t forget to set the alarm clock .
segments.speaker: S2
